SELECT `TABLE_NAME`, `TABLE_COMMENT`, `CREATE_TIME`, `UPDATE_TIME` FROM information_schema.`TABLES` WHERE `TABLE_SCHEMA` = (SELECT DATABASE()) AND `TABLE_NAME` NOT LIKE 'qrtz_%' AND `TABLE_NAME` NOT LIKE 'act_%'
AND lower(`TABLE_NAME`) like lower(concat('%', #{tableName}, '%'))
AND lower(`TABLE_COMMENT`) like lower(concat('%', #{tableComment}, '%'))
AND date_format(`CREATE_TIME`,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%y%m%d')
AND date_format(`CREATE_TIME`,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%y%m%d')
ORDER BY `CREATE_TIME` DESC
